name: Blotch
description:
By Henry Xuanfei B. and Ryan T.

Welcome to Blotch, a single-player game in which you, the brush master, will paint for victory. Do you have what it takes to face the dreadful enemies that await?

Background Music Credits:
Music by Ronak Raval / RAME / RokZRooM
 https://freesound.org/people/RokZRooM/sounds/572229/
 https://rameofficial.com/
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
